home_title: A website template for development projects
home_description: This template serves as a starting point for React projects. Explore the features and components available.
feature_cta_description: Learn how to create compelling CTA buttons that drive user engagement.
feature_images_description: Implement images that adapt to all devices.
feature_bullets_description: Use bullet points to present information clearly.
feature_animations_description: Enhance user experience with smooth animations.
all_features_description: Explore the full range of features available in this template.
github_cta_description: Visit the GitHub repository to contribute or report issues.
documentation_language_notice: For now, the documentation is only available in French.
documentation_intro_description: Explore our components by clicking on the links below.
